data: It speedily ran amongst us of the cuddy that the dead sailor who had been so very impressively interred by old Keeling had returned to the ship, and was alive in some part of her, secure in handcuffs or in leg-irons; but so much was made of the fire which had broken out that Crabbâ€™s reappearance lost as a miracle half the weight it would have carried had it happened alone.
My Shipmate Louise: The Romance of a Wreck, Volume 2
